name: Henry in Panic
overview: A Jet Set Willy style platform game by Kim Byrresen, winning the game gets you access to the level editor. Henry is a little man who had a problem. Last weekend he was so friendly, he held a part for all his buddies, but being a little drunk the place became a mess. When he woke up and shook off most of the hangover he realized he was going to have to clean the place up alone. But his head is pounding so he also needs food...badly!! Your mission is to help Henry clean up and eat some food so his headache will lessen.
